name: Status
introduce:
Status is a secure messaging app, crypto wallet, and Web3 browser built with state of the art technology.Status gives users the power to chat, transact, and access a revolutionary world of DApps on the decentralized web.
Status is also building foundational infrastructure for the whole Ethereum ecosystem, including the Nimbus ETH 1.0 and 2.0 clients, the Keycard hardware wallet, and the Waku messaging protocol (a continuation of Whisper).
